description.debug:
Debug output from dmxlib
Log output below warning are only send to the console for debuging purposes

tip.bind: Tip: Only one Port can be bound to one ip address. Please notice when selecting '0.0.0.0'.
tip.port: Tip: Default Port is 6454. Can be in the Range 0 - 65535
tip.oemcode: Tip: Default Code is 0x2908 (Manufacturer: margau ProductName: dmxnet), 0x0000 (Manufacturer: Artistic Licence Engineering Ltd ProductName: Dmx-Hub) or any other Hex value.
tip.estacode: Tip: Default Code is 0x0000 (Manufacturer: ESTA), 0x414C (Manufacturer: Artistic Licence Engineering Ltd.) or any other Hex value.
tip.address:
Address to send to.
Tip: By default this is the limited broadcast (255.255.255.255) but can be all forms of broadcast (local or directed) or any other valid unicast address
tip.maxrate: Maximum amount of ArtDMX frames to send (default 10). If values arrive in a higher frequency the spontaneous sending will be delayed. Range: 0 - 50. With value 0 wthe spontaneous sending will be deactivated. So the transmission of ArtDMX frames will only be controlled via the value Refresh.
tip.refresh:
This value is in ms (default 1000).
Tip: After this interval the Art-Dmx data will be resend regardless of whether the data has been changed. If any Art-Dmx value is changed the data will be sent immediatly dependig of the value of MaxRate.
Caution: This value must be higher than the time defined by MaxRate. Don't care if MaxRate is 0
tip.savevalues: Tip: When checked all DMX values are saved to context on close. So the DMX values are immediatly available after deploy.
tip.ignoreaddress: Tip: When checked all address information from the msg object will be ignored. Otherwise an attempt is made to find a matching universe inside this controller. If there is no matching universe the data is sent to the configured sender.

errors.list: Listing of ip addresses failed. Try to restart Node-RED.
